components.name: Charts
components.description: Charts are visual representations of data. They can help convey complex information in a straightforward, visual format, making it easier to understand patterns, trends, and outliers.

components.name: Components
components.description: Components are the building blocks of the API. They are the objects that you will interact with to get data from the API.

components.name: Datasets
components.description: Datasets are collections of data that the API can process. Understanding how to manipulate datasets is crucial for effective data visualization.

components.name: Event Listener
components.description: Event listeners respond to events triggered by real-time data updates, ensuring your application can react dynamically to new information.

components.name: Feature Engineering
components.description: Feature engineering involves transforming raw data into meaningful features that can improve model performance. It includes tasks like normalization, encoding, and selection.

components.name: Models
components.description: Machine learning models are algorithms that can learn patterns and relationships from data. They are used for tasks like classification, regression, and clustering.

components.name: WebSocket
components.description: WebSocket provides full-duplex communication channels over a single TCP connection, allowing for real-time data flow between the client and server.
